column1: verif_1;1;A given date (date1) is no later than a second given date (date2). ;This is typically used to verify start and end date pairs
column2: but it also applies to any pair of dates where one is known to precede the other.;intraform;"date1::ic_date::seronco1

column1: verif_2;1;The period (years) between two given dates is inside a defined range.;;interform;"date1::ic_date::seronco1
